Question
========

The probability of a Type II error goes up if. I. the number of subjects goes up II. the significance level goes up

Answerlist
----------

* I is TRUE and II is false
* I is false and II is true
* I and II are both untrue

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* I is TRUE and II is false: Incorrect
* I is false and II is true: Incorrect
* I and II are both untrue: Correct
